title: London's water supply
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures and Metropolitan Water Board
brief_description: Illustrates how the Board supplies some six and a half million people in and around London with water for all their needs - a daily consumption of 380 million gallons. Shows where the water sources are, water treatment, pumping, quality control and distribution, waste detection and administration.
